```{r}

n <- 1
sig <- .1
t <- .3
s <- seq(0.01, .99, by = .001)
n_s <- length(s)

y <- rep(0, n_s)
z <- y

for (i in (1:n_s)) {
  y[i] <- g_bar(n, s[i], t, sig)
  z[i] <- sample_g_bar(t, sig)
}
plot(s, y)
hist(z, freq = FALSE, breaks = 15)
sum(z <= 0)
```
